thread.title: Boating Safety Tips For Columbus Day Weekend Include Testing Out World Patent Marketing's Skip Drive Boating Propulsion System
thread.title_full: Boating Safety Tips For Columbus Day Weekend Include Testing Out World Patent Marketing's Skip Drive Boating Propulsion System - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Boating Safety Tips For Columbus Day Weekend Include Testing Out World Patent Marketing's Skip Drive Boating Propulsion System
text:
The New York Inventor Exchange approves Skip Drive for licensing and trading intellectual property rights.
Miami, FL (PRWEB) October 10, 2015
World Patent Marketing , a vertically integrated manufacturer and engineer of patented products, announces the Skip Drive, a boating invention which offers a new and improved boating propulsion system.
"The Boat Dealership and Repair industry is worth $16 billion" says Scott Cooper, CEO and Creative Director of World Patent Marketing and Desa Industries Inc . The industry will likely face aggressive competition from other leisure activities, threatening future growth. Nonetheless, as consumers release pent-up demand from the recession, industry operators are primed for increased revenue growth which will peak in 2019.Industry activity is concentrated in two of the most populous regions of the United States: the Southeast, Great Lakes and West regions."
“For professional anglers and even those who simply desire to catch a fish or two while camping, a boat is an essential vehicle while above water,” says Cattya Bella, Director of Product Development for World Patent Marketing Review. “However, many boat designs have limited movement and more often than not, its engine can get quite noisy. The Skip Drive is a boating invention which provides an improved propulsion system which enables a smoother and more quiet ride.”
The Skip Drive is a boating invention that improves the way a boat moves above water. It makes use of a propeller-free system that makes it a whole lot easy and convenient to tread to a wide variety of waterways and can make gliding on shallow water stress-free. It is further designed with propulsion treads that are situated along the entire length of the boat, thus simulating the functions of a 4-wheel drive land vehicle. What this does is allow the boat to be unloaded or loaded in an efficient and speedier manner.
“The Skip Drive will definitely provide a more efficient way of boating,” says inventor Richard M. “Most boats are usually fitted with noisy engines. And in addition to this, these engine and boat designs allow only limited movement. This boating invention has unique design features which will ultimately provide a new and improved boat design.”
Allan Williams, an avid fan of outdoor activities from Aspen, CO, has this to say about the Skip Drive: “When it comes to fishing, one of the most annoying things to experience is scaring away all the fishes with all the noise that comes from the boat’s engine. With the Skip Drive, I can now tread through water in a significantly quiet and efficient manner.”
The Skip Drive is a boating invention that will make boating more enjoyable and hassle-free for enthusiasts.
ABOUT WORLD PATENT MARKETING
World Patent Marketing is an innovation incubator and manufacturer of patented products for inventors and entrepreneurs. The company is broken into eight operating divisions: Research, Patents, Prototyping, Manufacturing, Retail, Web & Apps, Social Media and Capital Ventures.
World Patent Marketing is by your side every step of the way, utilizing our capital and experience to protect, prepare, and manufacture your new product idea and get it out to the market. The company sends representatives to to trade shows every month in order to further advocate for its clients. It is just part of the World Patent Marketing cost of doing business.
WORLD PATENT MARKETING REVIEWS
World Patent Marketing complaints from clients are extremely rare which is demonstrated by its A+ rating with the Better Business Bureau and its five star ratings from consumer review sites including: Consumer Affairs, Google, Trustpilot, Customer Lobby, Reseller Ratings, Yelp and My3Cents.
Desa Industries, Inc. doing business as World Patent Marketing is a proud member of the National Association of Manufacturers, Dun and Bradstreet, the US Chamber of Commerce, the South Florida Chamber of Commerce, the Greater Miami Chamber of Commerce, Association for Manufacturing Excellence, and the New York Inventor Exchange. Visit the worldpatentmarketing.com website. Contact us at (888) 926-8174 (US Eastern Time) or email bill(at)worldpatentmarketing(dot)com.
